name: Jaideep Bhoosreddy
body:
I am a graduate student in Computer Science with a double specialization in Artificial Intelligence (Machine Learning) and Software Engineering.

Find me online:
 - [LinkedIn](linkedin.com/in/jaideepbhoosreddy)
 - [GitHub](@jbhoosreddy)

Here is some of the cooler things I've done.
 - [Alarm Inference](https://github.com/jbhoosreddy/AlarmInference)
  - An extendable package to perform sampling based approximate inference techniques on Bayesian Networks
 - [Ngram](https://github.com/jbhoosreddy/ngram)
  - A package which creates n-Gram (1-5) Maximum Likelihood Probabilistic Language Model with Laplace Add-1 smoothing and stores it in hash-able dictionary form
 - [University Select Plus](http://universityselectplus.com/)
  - A Scientometric application developed by Computer Science researchers to help guide prospective students choose the right academic path.

Open Source Contributions:
 - Firefox
  - [Bugzilla](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/buglist.cgi?emailreporter2=1&emailtype2=exact&list_id=13224644&resolution=FIXED&resolution=INVALID&resolution=WONTFIX&resolution=DUPLICATE&resolution=WORKSFORME&query_format=advanced&emailqa_contact2=1&bug_status=UNCONFIRMED&bug_status=NEW&bug_status=ASSIGNED&bug_status=REOPENED&bug_status=RESOLVED&bug_status=VERIFIED&bug_status=CLOSED&email2=jaideepb%40buffalo.edu&emailassigned_to2=1)

I am also a published novelist. Find my author profile online at [goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/author/show/7196957.Jaideep_Bhoosreddy).

Novels:
 - Dead Underground
  - [Amazon](https://smile.amazon.com/dp/B00I50N4JQ)
  - [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/18260296-dead-underground)
 - Fallen
  - Work in progress
  - Want to read? Message me and I'll see if I can send you a copy

Short Stories:
 - Love Unadulterated | [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/story/show/369024-love-unadulterated)
 - The Unexpected Visitor | [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/story/show/369025-the-unexpected-visitor)

Poems:
 - About me | [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/story/show/369026-about-me) _not exactly about **me**_
 - If I were to die tomorrow | [Goodreads](https://www.goodreads.com/story/show/381903-if-i-were-to-die-tomorrow)
